project_descr: UNDP projects under Bhutan UN Country Fund

outputs.output_descr:
Access to Justice: The project will aim to achieve the following by 2018: i) Ethical, competent and autonomous legal profession and a legal aid system is developed in line with international standards; ii) Access to justice for women and disadvantaged groups is strengthened; iii) Access to justice for poverty reduction and environmental sustainability is increased; and iv) Strengthened policy dialogue, aid harmonization, strategic planning and coordination in the justice sector.

GRPB: The GRPB strategy manual and document is being finalized within the Department of National Budget at the Mini

Public education to combat and prevent gender-based violence, including information and media campaigns, grass-roots advocacy and support to community based volunteers, including in schools, and working with men and boys to fight gender-based violence. 

Providing standards and guidelines for full cycle support, including through: support to development of standard operating procedures; strengthening existing women and child protection services; health facilities, and NGOs to provide economic integration support.

project_title: undp projects under bhutan un country fund
